fields.name: ${prefix}play
fields.value: Usage: ${prefix}play {Youtube URL or Video Title} | Plays the audio from the specified video

fields.name: ${prefix}queue
fields.value: Usage: ${prefix}queue {Youtube URL or Video Title} | Adds the video to the queue or if no video is provided then it will show you what's in the queue

fields.name: ${prefix}stop
fields.value: Usage: ${prefix}stop | Stops the currently playing song

fields.name: ${prefix}skip
fields.value: Usage: ${prefix}skip | Skips the currently playing song

fields.name: ${prefix}vol
fields.value: Usage: ${prefix}vol {volume from 0 to 100} | Sets the volume the bot plays at
